name: Deep Dive (Sally Stitches)
description:
Currently only early access. Sites 2-5 will be part of the full game, which will likely be paid.

---------------------------------------------------------------

You are a submarine pilot for the Galactic Mining Corporation. You've been stationed on Aquarris, an ocean planet that is the source of one of the galaxy's most important resources.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Sorry it it isn't the most interesting demo. My hope is that the feedback from this demo can be used to make the next four chapters really stand out. Make sure to leave a comment with any criticism or ideas for improvement, but please remember to be respectful.
